%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%text size, roughly the standard A4 values
\setlength\textwidth{390pt}
\setlength\textheight{580pt}

%I want more
\addtolength\textwidth{60pt}
\addtolength\oddsidemargin{-30pt}
\addtolength\textheight{70pt}
\addtolength\topmargin{-35pt}


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%small figure captions
\makeatletter
\let\old@makecaption=\@makecaption
\makeatother


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%equation numbers
\makeatletter
\@addtoreset{equation}{section}
\makeatother


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%bold maths in section titles
\makeatletter
\let\old@startsection=\@startsection
